about_the_game:
The Ezo Skydom, somewhere above the clouds.
Edogaka Peninsula, Kingdom of Kurozaki

Former assassin and revolutionary Rina Seiko is living a peaceful life as a Genji with her girlfriend Aya Hisagawa when she receives a strange letter bearing the royal seal.

The incumbent Fox Empress, under strain from the new Minister of Defence, calls upon Rina's services to retrieve an important item called the Skystone Codex, an ancient tome that holds the secrets to the skies. But her true reason for summoning the former hitokiri runs much deeper.

Powerful foes from fifteen years past seek the dangerous mysteries stored within this tome. The Staten Union, responsible for a terrible civil war that almost tore Kurozaki apart, is back in its airspace, hellbent on revenge. The power hungry Minister of Defence Yuichi Ono uses his own son Jigen as a pawn, citing him as a means to an end. And the supremely arrogant self-styled "Radiant Blademaster" Eisen Rast is obsessed with defeating the skies' strongest.

Can Rina and her friends avoid getting roped into a political conspiracy, one that stretches back 25,000 years? Can Rina avoid tapping into her dangerous "White Demon" persona?

Veiled Skies is a "cloudpunk" jRPG that serves as a cornerstone for the Kuroverse, a series of games set in a vast world covering three skydoms. Takes heavy inspiration from Granblue Fantasy.



Using a combat system similar to Bravely Default, use your turns immediately to claim instant victory or save them up to plan a more defensive strategy! Combine skills and even items to unleash even more powerful abilities that will overwhelm your foes! Rack up those combo counts to deal crazy amounts of damage!

Tired of status effects not working against powerful foes? Say no more. Mastering both Veiled Skies' Combo-orientated battle system and exploiting the foe's weaknesses will be crucial to your success! Want to go from dealing 250 damage in the beginning to over 90,000 at the end of the game? VS is the jRPG for you!



Other features:



  • Combine your healing spells into something far more potent to turn the tide during battle!
  • Tired of status effects not working against powerful foes? Say no more. Mastering both VS's Combo-orientated battle system and exploiting the foe's weaknesses will be crucial to your success!
  • Fast travel via airships or warp crystals.
  • No random encounters; enemies respawn when you move one screen away.
  • Unleash powerful Soul Urges, unique abilities tied to certain weapons. Mix and match your equipment to get the most out of them!
  • Other QoL features include full heal on level ups, KO'ed characters receive 50% EXP, auto-battling, auto-saving, rebindable keys support and more!
  • Customizable difficulty settings that can be changed via a simple in-game item. High risk, high reward!
  • 10-12 hours of content.
